name: ROBFS4U
description:
◆ For those who are considering purchasing (please check in advance) ◆
-Since animation is used a lot in battle scenes, it often puts a load on the PC in terms of operation.
We recommend that you check the operation with the trial version once.
・ Since this work is a biographical story, there is no problem even if you have not played the previous work.
・ There is a compulsory participation mini-game that requires Japanese input, although it takes about 1 minute at the beginning of the game.
(Use japanese word mini game don't read Japanese cannot play this game)

◆ Genre ◆
Battle fuck RPG

◆ Explanation ◆
An RPG with a parody of the world view of Laguna ○ Ku Online, which pursues gameplay
The battle will be a sex battle method that "the one who got it first loses"

In this work, the area with the most votes in the previous questionnaire is preferentially implemented.
We are also introducing characters that were highly requested to participate in the war.

  • In addition, there is no problem in playing even if you do not have knowledge of R ○.

◆ System ◆
The basic part is the same as the previous work ...
But this time it's possible to turn all your opponents into onapets and mistresses!

As a new system, you can accompany your mistress or caught monster as a partner.
They help players during battle by using assist skills

The undressing system is still alive, and this time we are also focusing on the animation part.
It is moving more than twice as much as the previous work
Details can be confirmed from the sample video

◆ Story ◆
Frontier land ... Komodo region ...
This was a peaceful place that was not affected at the beginning of the fog,
Gradually affected by miasma, the damage caused by new species of monsters
It was spreading.

"To get information about the missing master," he said.
The poet and dancer who saw off their friend (Novice) heading to the continental capital
Rescue a young man at the beach on his way home.

"I don't remember anything other than my name, I can't remember ..."
The poet and the dancer treat such a young man as friends ...
The young man also acted as a friend, feeling the grace of those two.

The three were spending a peaceful time in the city of Komodo.
The shrine maiden of the spirit festival, which is said to be held every year, is selected-until then.
